remarks: The mapping from fiducial atom to set of dilations.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dilset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dilset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
dilset.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
dilset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
dilset.l $e |- L = ( Dil ` K ) $.
dilfsetN $p |- ( K e. B -> L = ( d e. A |-> { f e. M | A. x e. S ( x C_ ( W ` d ) -> ( f ` x ) = x ) } ) ) $.
$d A d $.
$d K d f x $.
$d M f $.
$d S x $.
